videos.author: CovertGoBlue
videos.title: We Get Political...In Commander  Tivit vs Bumbleflower vs Queen Marchesa vs Aragorn, King of Gondor
videos.description:
The Worst Possible Commander Show brings another round of paper EDH gameplay with political commanders! Featuring: Ms. Bumbleflower, Queen Marchesa, Tivit, and Aragorn

Format - Commander / EDH
Newest Set - Foundations

Commanders -
Tivit, Seller of Secrets
Ms. Bumbleflower
Queen Marchesa
Aragorn, King of Gondor

Ben: https://moxfield.com/decks/-U1HIUpNRU-l2q_2Zp2pJA
Shea: https://moxfield.com/decks/ScNH9DI5L0iYQBpkzoGfug

videos.author: CovertGoBlue
videos.title: Ur-Dragon I Wise Mothman I Go-Shintai I Caesar I Imodane  Live Commander MTG Gameplay
videos.description:
The Worst Possible Commander show goes LIVE with some of their recent favorites including the new Secret Lair deck, 20 Ways to Win!  Does it have any ways to win?  Other commanders include Caesar, Legion's Emperor,  The Wise Mothman, Imodane, the Pyrohammer, The Ur-Dragon.

Format - Commander / EDH
Newest Set - Foundations
*Twitch VOD from 1-15-24*
